name: PinPang
description:
This game is an entry for the BBQ Game Jam 2017. It has been made in 24H at the Technoport in Esch-Sur-Alzette,  Luxembourg.

It's a 2vs2 game, the goal is to cooperate with the opposite player to score points against side players.

To do that you can move your paddle left and right in your limited area, and you can also rotate your paddle in order to aim more precisely. The ball speed will increase a little bit after each bounce against a player's paddle,  scoring will reset the speed.

Note : because of the lack of time, we couldn't implement the score system correctly, the paddle movements could also use some fine tuning.

Team Gaijin members

Angélique Labbé : graphic designer

Yannic Kissel : graphic designer - music and sound composer

Lucas Milakovic : game designer

Jérôme Labbé : developer
